body: Wait, what? because she got rejected by him thus she looks for comfort from her home tutor by giving her virginity to him then she became his sex slave (they didn't became lovers), been trained to all sorts of sex plays, got impregnated by him but aborted it since tutor doesn't love her so he doesn't want to take responsibility, got dumped by him, has random sex with other guys in town to please herself then became lovers with her sissy childhood friend in the end but still can't live a proper life and still do roleplays thus her childhood friend lover is also her master? I'd say that it is a happy ending but still a crappy story regardless.
If it were me, I'd fuck her once and dump her.
Pixie cut is a tag? Huh
I expected more play from the guy, but just received vanilla
MC is an idiot so he'll have to take the consequences. Alright, pretty tame shit coming from Hoshino Ryuichi... like they always say "old but gold".
